message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I'm offering for sale. I'm looking to get $10000 for it.  It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $8500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low right now.  How about we split the difference and go with $9250?  It's still a great deal for you, and it gets us closer to a deal.
